refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if real audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o pluck.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kcps = 220 icps = 220 ifn = 0 imeth = p4
asig pluck 0.7, 220, 220, ifn, imeth, .1, 10 outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 5 1 i 1 5 5 4 ;needs 2 extra parameters (iparm1, iparm2) i 1 10 5 6 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
